title: Crunchyroll Winter 2023 Simulcast Slate Offers Largest Line-Up Yet
description: The Crunchyroll Winter Simulcast 2023 slate is the biggest anime line-up yet, with TRIGUN STAMPEDE, VINLAND SAGA Season 2, and more!

title: Superman & Lois, James Gunn/DCU, Sandman & More: BCTV Daily Dispatch
description: In today's BCTV Daily Dispatch: James Gunn/DCU/Superman/Henry Cavill, Superman & Lois, SNL, The Sandman, The Nevers/#Westworld & tons more!

title: How Buck’s Journey Is One Thread in 9-1-1’s Emotional Tapestry
description: Buck is an integral part of the fabric of 9-1-1 and we're looking at his journey on the procedural. Come discuss with us! The post How Buck’s Journey Is One Thread in 9-1-1’s Emotional Tapestry appeared first on TV Fanatic.
author: Whitney Evans

title: Night Court Exclusive Sneak Peek Showcases Ray Abruzzo’s Return as Tony Giuliano
description: Night Court Season 3 Episode 16 welcomes back an original star. Check out an exclusive sneak peek of Ray Abruzzo's comeback. The post Night Court Exclusive Sneak Peek Showcases Ray Abruzzo’s Return as Tony Giuliano appeared first on TV Fanatic.
author: Paul Dailly

title: Casting News: Matt Lauria Joins CBS’ Fire Country Spinoff and More
description: CSI: Vegas vet Matt Lauria is getting a badge for his next role: The actor will star opposite Morena Baccarin in the Fire Country spinoff Sheriff Country, our sister site Deadline reports. Lauria’s Boone is the smart and capable chief deputy and right-hand man to Baccarin’s Sheriff Mickey Fox. After being partnered for years, the […]
author: Vlada Gelman

title: Cedric the Entertainer Talks Nixed Neighborhood Spinoff, Offers Update on Tracy Morgan Offshoot Crutch
description: Cedric the Entertainer is just as bummed as you are that The Neighborhood spinoff starring TV sons Sheaun McKinney and Marcel Spears is not moving forward. But he also admits that he was only “somewhat” surprised by CBS’ decision. “I do recognize that we’re in a very difficult time as far as television goes,” the […]
author: Ryan Schwartz
